item.title: The next #OSMF General Meeting and board election is on 19 Oct. 2024. If you want to run for the Board, you must be a member by 22 Apr. 2024. There will be 4 Board positions open. If you're not sure that you want to run for the Board, but you think you MIGHT be interested, you should join! Join OSM here: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/#Membership-Categories #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMFoundation #OSMFMembershipCampaign

#SotM2024: Call for Academic Track Abstracts! This year‚Äôs State of the Map conference will feature OSM Science 2024, the 7th edition of the Academic Track of State of the Map ‚Äì a full day of sessions dedicated to academic research about, and with, OpenStreetMap. Authors are invited to submit abstracts (800-1200 words in plain text, without figures) using the OSM Science 2024 Pretalx submission system by 10 May 2024 https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/04/04/sotm-2024-call-for-academic-track-abstracts/ @sotm #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMScience #OpenScience

another highlight from WeeklyOSM #714 OSM user SeverinGeo advocated for introducing new contributors to OpenStreetMap through field mapping in this diary entry, https://www.openstreetmap.org/user/SeverinGeo/diary/403778, listing many reasons why the field mapping approach is a good one. "

Some highlights from weeklyOSM 714 Katja Haferkorn¬†reported¬†on the 21st FOSSGIS conference, which was held from 20 to 23 March in Hamburg. (Das war die FOSSGIS 2024 in Hamburg ‚Äì FOSSGIS ) image credit: Group photo participants FOSSGIS 2024 Hamburg [1] | ¬© FOSSGIS ‚Äì CC-BY-SA

üì£ Calling OSM Brazil! On 2 Apr, at 7 pm (Bras√≠lia time), the Brazilian community will hold its monthly virtual meeting. Discussions will cover current and future projects. Details are here: https://buff.ly/4adjQ2B

Happy Trans* Day of Visibility! Trans people are mappers, and hackers, and cartographers, and have always been a part of the OpenStreetMap community. The OpenStreetMap project is creating a freely licenced map of the world, based on how things actually are, based on how they act, and appear, not based on what some government says. OSM is trans positive. #OpenStreetMap #OSM #TDoV #TransDayOfVisibility #Trans https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/w/images/thumb/2/2f/2019_v1_OSM_Logo_trans.svg/480px-2019_v1_OSM_Logo_trans.svg.png

Our OSM Membership drive is still going! When you join the OSMF, you can: --support the map --make new friends --vote for board members --expand the diversity and impact of our amazing mapping community. Join ‚úçÔ∏èhttps://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/03/12/call-to-action-help-us-grow-and-diversify-osmf-membership/ üéØSupport our #OSMFMembershipCampaign üöÄ #foss4g #gischat #opencommunity #OSMF

The #OpenStreetMap community is massive, and spread out, often by language or country. Different groups use different ways to communicate. There's an index of all different communication channels, and for each region, which are the methods to use to talk to local mappers there. Source data: https://github.com/osmlab/osm-community-index Websites showing it: https://openstreetmap.community/ & https://community.osm.be/ #OSM

Do you want to present at #StateOfTheMap (@sotm), the annual #OpenStreetMap global conference, in Nairobi, Kenya? The submission form is open! Read more: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/03/20/sotm-2024-call-for-participation/ submission form: https://pretalx.com/sotm2024/submit/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #sotm2024 #sotm

The OpenStreetMap Foundation Board looks ahead to 2024. Following the ‚Äútradition‚Äù of the collective post in 2023, here are a few sentences from each of the Board members on where they want to contribute in 2023. https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/03/12/the-openstreetmap-foundation-board-looks-ahead-to-2024/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF #OSMFoundation

‚ÄúHelp Us Grow and Diversify OSMF Membership Worldwide‚Äù Hundreds of thousands of people have contributed map data to #OpenStreetMap, but just under 2,000 of them are members of the OpenStreetMap Foundation, the legal body which supports (but does not control) the OSM project. Why not change that? Join today! Join the OSMF here: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/#Membership-Categories read more: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/03/12/call-to-action-help-us-grow-and-diversify-osmf-membership/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat

Happy International Women's Day! #OpenStreetMap is about taking control of our maps from the small, centralized organisations, and giving the maps & the data to the people. Many of these closed mapmakers re-enforce patriarchy, and are dominated by men. With OSM, women can take control of maps! ‚úä ‚ôÄÔ∏è #IWD #IWD2024 #WomensDay #InternationalWomensDay #IntlWomensDay #Feminism #Feminist #OpenStreetMap #OSM
Did you know? The #OpenStreetMap Foundation has loads of corporate members! Check out the full list here: https://osmfoundation.org/wiki/Corporate_Members #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMF

WIthin OpenStreetMap, many like to use a structured proposal process for new OSM tags. At the end of the day, OSM still allows you to use ‚ÄúAny tags you like‚Äù, and skipping any formal tag voting proposal. Just start mapping with the tags you want! https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Any_tags_you_like #OpenStreetMap

The Local Chapters & Communities Congress will take place in a few days! Read More: https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Foundation/Local_Chapters/Local_Chapters_Congress/2024 #osmlccc24 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #OSMLCCC

Did you know? OSMers use a variety of software (‚Äúeditors‚Äù) to edit the OSM data. Several of them have Mastodon/Fediverse accounts! ‚Ä¢ @josmeditor ‚Ä¢ @everydoor ‚Ä¢ @streetcomplete ‚Ä¢ @MapComplete ‚Ä¢ @vespucci_editor #OpenStreetMap

OpenStreetMap is a mentoring org Google Summer of Code 2024, which offers students & new open source developers stipends to write code for open source software projects. If you‚Äôre interested, visit our Google Summer of Code 2024 wiki: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Google_Summer_of_Code/2024> You can pick from our list of project ideas, or your own idea related to one of the many open source projects in OSM world. (forum post: <https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/openstreetmap-is-participating-in-google-summer-of-code-2024/109588>) #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat #GSoC

There are now over 11,000 followers to this MÃ∂aÃ∂sÃ∂tÃ∂oÃ∂dÃ∂oÃ∂nÃ∂ Mapstodon account! üòç The future of mapping is maps controlled by the people for the people,¬†not big corporations or governments. The future of social media is social media controlled by the people for the people,¬†not big corporations or governments. Democratic social media for democratic maps. #Mapstodon #Mastodon #Fediverse #Open #UserControlled #Democracy #OpenStreetMap #OSM #FreeMaps #FreeSocialMedia

The OpenStreetMap website got a new feature: OSMers can now mute other users. If another OSMer is sending you too many messages, you can ‚Äúmute them‚Äù, leaving you free to continue mapping! The source code adding this: <https://github.com/openstreetmap/openstreetmap-website/pull/4284> #OpenStreetMap #OSM

Wow! Last year, OSMF had a fundraising drive. Individual people donated over ¬£113,000 in 3,000 individual donations, on average ¬£35 each! üòç Thank you all so much!! üôè üôá read more: <https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2024/02/13/mappers-universities-companies-and-nonprofits-contributed-over-373000-to-support-osm-in-2023/> We also recieved hundreds of thousands of pounds from dozens of corporations, both cash to OSMF, to regional groups, to regional conferences, and in kind. üôè (BTW you can still donate üòâ : <https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/donate/>) #OpenStreetMap #OSM
